mapper.select: select t.`id` as `id`, t.`commodityId` as `commodityId`, t.`count` as `count`, t.`createTime` as `createTime`, c.`coverImagePath` as `coverImagePath` from `t_thinkingfruit_mall_depot` as t left join `t_thinkingfruit_mall_commodity` as c on t.`commodityId`=c.`id` where t.`memberId` = #{id}

select t.`id` as `id`, t.`commodityId` as `commodityId`, c.`name` as `name`, t.`commodityCount` as `commodityCount`, t.`createTime` as `createTime`, t.`orderStatus` as `orderStatus`, c.`coverImagePath` as `coverImagePath` from `t_thinkingfruit_mall_order` as t left join `t_thinkingfruit_mall_commodity` as c on t.`commodityId`=c.`id` where t.`orderMemberId` = #{id}

select m.`mobile` as mobile, t.`province` as province, t.`city` as city, t.`town` as town, t.`address` as address, m.`name` as `memberName` from `t_thinkingfruit_mall_address` as t left join `t_thinkingfruit_mall_member` as m on t.`memberId` =m.`id` where t.`memberId` = #{memberId}
